name: Multitudes Vertical Slice
description:
Multitudes is a first-person interactive-fiction game where players explore identity and experiences that influence it. You'll get a clearer picture of the characters in the game the more you learn about their intersections.

This is the vertical slice of my year-long thesis project. I worked on it throughout the first semester. It's about a 10-minute sample of what the whole project will be like.

Many of the aspects will change, some dramatically so.

Feedback appreciated.
